comment: HTTPS security. [[User talk:DemonDays64|Tell me]] if there's an issue with my edit. (via [[WP:JWB]])

Why was that part made collapsible? The numbers of 'supporters' isn't huge. Neither are their names. Nor it makes the Infobox look weird? These are critical information and should be apparent. Converted collapsible list to a bullet list so that it is more conspicuous.
